div.div: Ripon College vs. St. Norbert College
at De Pere, Wis. | Schneider Stadium

tr.td: St. Norbert wins toss and defers. Ripon receives in north end.
SThompsonMeyers kickoff 65 yards to the RC00, touchback.
Brett Garst rush for 3 yards to the RC28 (Matt Barrett).
Logan Grahn rush for 7 yards to the RC35 (Ryan Grandlic).
Samuel Shroyer rush for 8 yards to the RC43 (S. Kwaterski).
Cody Chase rush for 2 yards to the RC45 (S. Kwaterski).
Samuel Shroyer rush for no gain to the RC45 (Tyler Jensen).
Cody Chase rush for 5 yards to the 50 yardline (Matt Barrett).
Brett Garst rush for 5 yards to the SNC45 (Alec Swanson).
Samuel Shroyer rush for loss of 2 yards to the SNC47 (S. Kwaterski).
Samuel Shroyer pass intercepted by Tommy Gonzales at the SNC45, Tommy Gonzales return 2 yards to the SNC47.
St. Norbert College drive start at 10:18.
J.T. Crosby rush for 18 yards to the RC35 (Jared Zeman).
Elijah Fort rush for 2 yards to the RC33 (Parker Groves).
Elijah Fort rush for 5 yards to the RC28 (Brandon Bartel; Parker Groves).
Samuel Shroyer rush for 4 yards to the RC32 (Will Utesch).
Samuel Shroyer rush for 4 yards to the RC36 (Kordell Draves).
Cody Chase rush for 1 yard to the RC37 (Kordell Draves).
Cody Chase rush for 4 yards to the RC41 (Ben Kornowski).
Cody Chase rush for 3 yards to the RC44 (Ben Kornowski; Matt Barrett).
Samuel Shroyer rush for 5 yards to the RC49 (Ryan Grandlic).
Cody Chase rush for 5 yards to the SNC46 (Matt Barrett).
Samuel Shroyer rush for 2 yards to the SNC44 (Matt Barrett).
Samuel Shroyer rush for 3 yards to the SNC41 (S. Kwaterski).
Cameron Gruenwa punt 33 yards to the SNC08, fair catch by Tyler Jensen.

Elijah Fort rush for 4 yards to the SNC12 (Parker Groves).
Elijah Fort rush for 1 yard to the SNC13 (Parker Groves).

Samuel Shroyer rush for 1 yard to the SNC20 (R.J. Callow).
Samuel Shroyer rush for 4 yards to the SNC16 (R.J. Callow; Kordell Draves).
Samuel Shroyer rush for 16 yards to the SNC00, TOUCHDOWN, clock 14:56.
Logan Grahn kickoff 40 yards to the SNC25, fair catch by Grant Murray.

Elijah Fort rush for no gain to the SNC25 (Josie Schaffer).
Brett Olson rush for 5 yards to the SNC30 (Tyler Robida; Ethan Hoffman).
Jeff Allen punt 20 yards to the 50 yardline, downed.
Austin Bunders rush for 3 yards to the SNC47 (Tommy Gonzales).
Samuel Shroyer rush for loss of 1 yard to the SNC48, fumble by Samuel Shroyer recovered by RC Austin Bunders at SNC47, fumble forced by Matt Gurgone.
PENALTY RC false start (Justin Cox) 5 yards to the RC48.
Samuel Shroyer sacked for loss of 4 yards to the RC44 (R.J. Callow).
Cameron Gruenwa punt 35 yards to the SNC21, fair catch by Tyler Jensen.

Brad Boockmeier rush for 7 yards to the SNC28 (Armando Mosqued).

Samuel Shroyer rush for 8 yards to the RC30 (Tommy Gonzales).
Brandon Barnes rush for loss of 5 yards to the RC25 (S. Kwaterski).

J.T. Crosby pass complete to S. Staehling for 8 yards to the RC32 (Ethan Hoffman).

Austin Bunders rush for 1 yard to the RC26, fumble by Austin Bunders recovered by SNC Ryan Grandlic at RC29, fumble forced by Alec Swanson, Ryan Grandlic for 29 yards to the RC00, TOUCHDOWN, clock 05:45.
